metadata.title: Guard of honor presented to IHCâ€™s CJ after oath

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 08 (APP):A guard of honor ceremony was held in honor of Chief Justice Islamabad High Court (IHC) Justice Sardar Sarfaraz Dogar upon his arrival after taking the oath of his office. A contingent of the Federal Police presented guard of honor to Chief Justice Sardar Sarfaraz Dogar. A large number of judicial officers, lawyers, and High Court employees were also present on the occasion.
